mapper.select: SELECT * FROM enrollment ORDER BY ENROLLMENT_ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ENROLLMENT (ENROLLMENT_ID, USERID, NAME, TEACHER_ID, TEACHER_NAME, COURSE_ID, COURSE_NAME, ENROLLMENT_DATE) VALUES (seq_enrollment_enrollment_id.NEXTVAL, #{userid}, #{name}, #{teacher_id}, #{teacher_name}, #{course_id}, #{course_name}, SYSDATE)
